data.title: Raul Curiel
data.text:
WHAT IS Raul Curiel'S RECORD?

Raul Curiel's record currently stands at 13 wins, 0 loses and 0 draws. Raul is currently undefeated in a total of 13 contests.

Of those 13 wins he has stopped 11 of his opponents, so his current knock-out ratio is 84.6%. He's boxed a total of 63 rounds, meaning his professional fights last 4.8 rounds on average.

WHERE IS Raul Curiel FROM?

Raul Curiel “Cugar” is a professional boxer from Tampico, Tamaulipas, Mexico.

HOW OLD IS Raul Curiel?

The Super Welterweight is currently 29 years old. He was born in December 6, 1995.

HOW LONG HAS Curiel BEEN FIGHTING?

Raul Curiel made his professional debut in May 6, 2017, so he has been a pro for 7 years.

HOW TALL IS Raul Curiel?

Curiel is 5′ 8″ which is 173cm.

WHAT IS Curiel'S REACH?

His reach is 70″ which is 178cm.

WHAT STANCE DOES Raul Curiel USE?

Curiel fights in the Orthodox stance.
